channel.title: CVE Feed for Podlove -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Podlove -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-32139|2024-07-03T18:27:48.243Z -- podlove -- podlove%20podcast%20publisher
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Podlove Podlove Podcast Publisher.This issue affects Podlove Podcast Publisher: from n/a through 4.0.12.

item.title: CVE-2024-35710|2024-06-10T14:09:20.730Z -- podlove -- podlove%20web%20player
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Podlove Podlove Web Player.This issue affects Podlove Web Player: from n/a through 5.7.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-32139|2024-04-15T07:18:06.270Z -- podlove -- podlove%20podcast%20publisher
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Podlove Podlove Podcast Publisher.This issue affects Podlove Podcast Publisher: from n/a through 4.0.12.

item.title: CVE-2024-32143|2024-06-11T18:41:22.999Z -- podlove -- podlove%20podcast%20publisher
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Podlove Podlove Podcast Publisher.This issue affects Podlove Podcast Publisher: from n/a through 4.1.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-32712|2024-06-04T17:51:03.079Z -- podlove -- podlove%20podcast%20publisher
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Podlove Podlove Podcast Publisher.This issue affects Podlove Podcast Publisher: from n/a through 4.0.14.

item.title: CVE-2024-32812|2024-06-04T17:51:53.367Z -- podlove -- podlove%20podcast%20publisher
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Podlove Podlove Podcast Publisher.This issue affects Podlove Podcast Publisher: from n/a through 4.0.11.

item.title: CVE-2024-29915|2024-03-27T07:07:03.372Z -- podlove -- podlove%20podcast%20publisher
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Podlove Podlove Podcast Publisher allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Podlove Podcast Publisher: from n/a through 4.0.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-29788|2024-03-27T12:46:34.048Z -- podlove -- podlove%20web%20player
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Podlove Podlove Web Player allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Podlove Web Player: from n/a through 5.7.1.
